text:
i cannot shutdown or restart the server because it looks for LOGS\HTTPD.PID, 
which does not exisit. if someone can help me by sendimg me a replacement file, 
please do!
creator: hchs@ns.sympatico.ca
slive@apache.org
text:
This is a support question rather than a bug report, so it should be addressed
to: http://httpd.apache.org/userslist.html

[A couple hints:
- See: http://httpd.apache.org/docs/windows.html
- If you are running in a console window, simply press ctrl-c
- If you are running as a service, use "apache -k shutdown"
]
